content.detailedDescription:
It was a few years ago, but i can remember pretty clearly that night. we were on camp fire on a field just outside the city. i was lying on my back checking out the stars, looking for satellites and meteors, when i saw -coming from north-west - a group of three bright dots moving with a constant speed and direction towards south-east. the dots were arranged in the shape of an isosceles triangle (group 1, as pictured in my sketch). i pretty quickly ruled out the aircraft theory - i happen to be an amateur astronomer and an aviation fan and i know an aircraft when i see it, no matter if it's night or day. i watched as the starry triangle passed above us and eventually dissapeared near the horizon. the other guys weren't impressed by the sighting, but i considered it at least nice, if not thought provoking. the pass took, from the moment i discovered the dots, about one or two minutes, but i might be wrong since i was quite hyped. soon after that i spotted another two bright dots (group 2), this time coming from north and heading south. they appeared to have the same altitude and speed as the previous ones. i thought they were satellites. the speed and size was similar to the orbital satellites i spotted over the years, but i've never saw such groups. then i thought they maybe were debris, or some shuttle mission docking to the international space station, adding modules or whatever. at that time i ran out of scientific explanations and, altough being a skeptic, i made room for some other possibility.

additional notes: 
* at the time of the sighting i could not have checked on internet if there was a scheduled shuttle mission or some other space activity that might have appeared to ground viewers as stated above.
* the triangle wasn't filled/solid since i could see the background stars between its bright dots.
* the dots in the sketch and the distances between them are bigger than the originals.

request: i'd like to know your opinion about this event. thank you.
content.summary: Groups of lights moving in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: I was outside standing in my driveway, trying to unwind and relax so i could go back into the house and get a few hours sleep.  i just so happen to look up at the sky and see 2 star like objects appearing to be equal distance apart and moving away from one another.  object a was traveling towards the n.E and object b was traveling towards the s.E.  the sky was partly cloudy and after about 10 seconds of watching both objects, they went into some clouds that were drifting across the sky and i didn't see them anymore.
content.summary: Was outside at 4:20 am.  gazed up and saw 2 star like objects moving across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
The entity, i say it as it is "asexual"?    well, i left out items, that were discussed, so  "it" pushes me to make it known that
included with multidimensional equations are existent we shouldnt forget 3 dimesnional graphs to include them into our data....Prime example the earths axis as it relates to an x/y  volume graph as it rotates ....Using (not sure) conical volume dimensions?   possibly included in the calculation&calibration of force/gravity/velocity/trajectory/vector analysis?      also new item.....That if we can calculate locale and formula to include the forces, then displacement theory, like water displacement, if we can displace molcecules at a designated location, like an "immitation" we can be close to acheiving the reality of beaming, molecules from one point to another.....I hope this makes sense to someone who is mathematically inclined, because im not.....I have no other explanation for my rcvng messages other than the fact that i was abducted, but could it be the spinal fusion from my low back injury...I have thought that the possibility of the titanium structure may be of assistance, or does "their" dna contain more metal compounds than ours????Hmmmmm
--brodie
content.summary: Entity is pushy

content.detailedDescription: Really never saw it. i did not notice it until after we were home reviewing vacation photos.
content.summary: Really never saw it. i did not notice it until after we were home reviewing vacation photos.

content.detailedDescription:
1959 experienced a guided white light infront or at distance
from the moon this was witnessed by my brother.

again in 1972 a sphere was seen 'arching' for 30 mins approx..Covering 30 miles in one arch and returning back and forth. this was around a village called 'brinklow' @ the end of the roman, 'fosse way'.

another sighting of one later that year.

willesden london 1974
 i experienced a pesonal abduction with, 'now i know, now' - "blondies" (but did not know any catagories of aliens then) with pale features and blond hair. many people were in the same abduction. 
there was a round very large disk and the inerior was round skirted by windows.  the aliens were examining quite a few people on tables of black supports and conversing with mental communication and not in speech.  i provided the alien with some information and she/he/it said 'that i was not required'.  i then was escourted away, however a lot of people were decending down this black staircase or ramp. i then felt a return to my room. prior to abduction the sheets of my bed were of a 'plastic' texture.
i did not know then, of any 'types' of alien, only years afterwards did i learn of the alien groups. so by this aspect it could substantiate the abduction.  there is much more to tell on this, so i do hope to be able to to relate to you, at a time in the future.
content.summary: I've experienced 3 ufo( definate) sightings and had a possible (personal)  abduction

content.detailedDescription:
My kids and i had spent the day at the skate park with a close friend of mine and her two kids. it was a fun day, everyone had a good time. we finally made it home around 7:30pm so my kids could pack up their sleeping bags as they were invited to stay the night. i had a quick bowl of noodles, the kids had eaten mcdonalds earlier, and later arrived at my friend���s house around 8:15pm. 
as i stood in the driveway talking with my friend my kids took their things into the house. soon, her two kids and my two kids came out of the house and were now on their skate boards in the driveway. i had my camera with me as earlier i had taken pictures of the kids at the skate park. as i stood their talking with my friend i began to take more pictures of the kids doing tricks on their skateboards in her driveway and also of the sunset. 
later, after the kids had gone in the house, at about 8:46pm my batteries had died. (the reason i know this time is because of the last picture i had taken before the camera shut itself off. all my pictures have the time and date on them.) anyway, i had extra batteries in my car which was parked a couple feet away. i sat in the drivers seat behind the steering wheel as i replaced my batteries. i told my friend something strange had happened, then showed her when i replaced the batteries the camera said "set date and time?", the date read 01/01/2005 and the time read, 0:00. i thought it odd, and so did she, so i reset everything and talked with her as i took a few more pictures to see if my camera was ok���and it was. 
it was now around 9:20pm and i was sitting in my car with the engine running getting ready to head home. my friend was standing at the driver���s window and we were talking when she said���"what is that?���what is that?" and i said what? she was now pointing to the southwest and said��� "get out of your car and look!" i knew from her tone she was seeing something. i quickly grabbed my camera off the front seat, open the door, stepped out and looked to where she was pointing. sure enough, in the southwest part of the sky, not only was there sirius and a plane, but there was a glowing ball of gold light moving east. i was standing in her driveway facing south watching this thing. between me and this ball of gold light were many tall elm trees, and beyond those were a row of very tall pine trees which lined her neighbor���s driveway along with a barn, a horse trailer, and a house. this gold light went behind the pine trees still heading east while i ran to the front of my car to get a better view because i knew there were large gaps between the trees over that way. when i got to the front of my car, now standing next to her shed, i turned my camera on and watched as that ball of light appeared to have stopped, and was now heading straight towards us getting bigger, and bigger. as it was getting closer i yelled "it���s coming straight at us!" i tried to get pictures and watch this thing at the same time. as it got closer it was now an oblong shape of gold light through the gap in the trees, and as it got closer yet it was brighter than ever and changing shape, and then when it lifted, and veered west i could see the underneath! it was a triangle! there were so many circular lights underneath it! i couldn't believe it! i said��� "it���s a triangle! oh my god it���s huge! look how big it is! that thing is huge!" and it was! this thing was massive! it could have easily covered her entire house. by the time this thing had hit the second gap in the trees i could see all the lights underneath it! it was so close to us! there were so many circular lights all along the underneath! there were long tube lights in the center of the round lights and towards the end of those was a circular red, haze! the sound coming from this thing���the only thing i can think of is my husband���s welding torch after he lights it. the gas sound along with the flame when he turns it up. 
like i said, i���m trying to watch this and take pictures at the same time. at this point my camera was in the red, it was almost exhausted of all battery power. i couldn���t believe it! i had just put in newly charged batteries. this thing now went behind the trees again heading west. i wanted to see more of it! i took off running towards the end of her driveway (west) as her neighbors were pulling into their driveway. i was now standing at the end of her driveway but i couldn���t see it. i yelled back to her because she was still standing in the same place��� "where is it!? where did it go!?" she yelled��� "get down here! it���s over here!" i ran back down the driveway and that���s when she informed me that as i was running up the driveway this thing had turned its course again, and was now heading east, then disappeared over the tree line behind her neighbor���s house. 
i stood out there for a long time looking for it, hoping it would come back. i wanted see more, i wanted to know more. my friend was now on the phone with her neighbors who had also seen it as they were driving down the road towards their house, and as they were pulling into their driveway. 
after a while, when i realized it wasn���t coming back, i went home. i went to bed with a headache starting, and woke up with a terrible migraine. i have had the migraine all day now. i went over to her house again this afternoon to pick up my kids and stayed a while as she told me of how she called the sheriffs office and reported it, and how she spoke with her neighbors again. just before i left her house i began to feel sick to my stomach. i came home and threw up around 5:00pm it is now 8:43pm saturday evening and i still feel sick to my stomach and i still have the migraine. the extra strength excedrin i took today didn���t work. 
i took 4 pictures all together. the one i was hoping turned out was when it was lifted upwards and veered to the west, but that picture only showed black. i don't understand why that one didn't turn out. this photo did turn out, but not as good as it should have.
content.summary: Bright triangle headed straight for us then veered away

content.detailedDescription:
Reading articles before and once again a statement from a listener on art bell last night.....The reference "there is 11 dimensions of space/time.."

the entity gets a laff his words are: " where do you come up with that quantity?"   it is even hard for them to quantify, there are actually 100's of dimesnsions!   maybe as humans we dont like to see further or have some arrogance....But "no there is not just eleven."
content.summary: Communications with the entity

content.detailedDescription: Yesterday (august 25, 2006) i was taking a few sky pictures and noticed this white streak in the sky. sometimes the streak would have an object flash at one end of it and sometimes not. there were also other white objects in the sky during this scenario at the same time the streak was "dancing" around. this streak would move from one side of the sky (horizon) to the other side in a 'split second' and then stop and stay stationary for a few seconds. the streak would also disappear and then reappear sometimes in the same place and sometimes appear in another place. i watched all this going on for 30 minutes and there was no intermission, it was a continuous show for 30 minutes starting at 9:15am and lasting till 9:45am. i had my camera and camcorder with me and took over 40 pictures that came out excellent. i will have to make three posts to show you what i saw. i will post this same message in all of them to avoid confusion in the event someone makes a post in between mine while i am posting mine. the mufon investigator assigned to my case has a cd-rom with all  the pictures on it for reference if anyone is interested.
content.summary: Light in clear daytime sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was fishing douwn by the bay of quinte i looked up in the sky and i seen
a bright light flying throug the sky it looked like a meteroid about10 times biger than a star i was watching for about 1 minnuit than it stoped
i didnt no what to think than it brock up in to three bright lights and
sat there for a minuit and a blink of an eye two of them were gone up in to space and the other one took of across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Well me and my mother were on a north west flight from minnesota to l.A. when we witnessed the ufo.We were both in our seats mine the window,heres the middle.It was about 11 o clock but im not sure.Anyway the hole time i was starring out the window watching the rolling clouds and such.When it happened we were over desert and it was just before we got into california(according to my mom).So im starring out my window and all the sudden i see this light above the clouds barely moveing.At first i thought it was a helicpoter or a firework.Then i realized it was far to high for either,even higher than the clouds.So i pointed it out to my mom and right as i turned back it was moving.With red and blue lights going round and round.It wasnt going that fast,but then what convinced us that it was out of the norm was when it just took off.Like nothing me or mother had ever seen.And we had seen a fighter jet earlier that flight.But this was soo much faster and just took off.
we later on thought that it could have been a reflection,but even the clouds below had a faint red and blue light on them as it dissapered.
so we our sure that what we have seen isnt of this world,or possibly not of our knoledge.
ryan n.
content.summary: During flight sighting

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped out on my front porch for a breath of fresh air before going to bed.

i looked up at the stars as i do each night, hoping to spot a satellite or shooting star. the night was very clear and there was litle or no moonlight. 

i noticed two balls of light in the sky, appearing much brighter than the surrounding stars or the planet venus. both lights together were about half the width of my little finger held at arms length. 

my first thought was that they might be from a commercial aircraft or small plane. however, the object was stationary and there were no flashing lights.

the object hovered in one spot for several minutes, making no motion at all. it never blinked or flashed. it made no sound that i could hear. after a few minutes,it moved rapidly to the west.

it moved from directly overhead to the horizon in approximately 10-15 seconds after which i lost sight of it.
content.summary: Dual spheres move rapidly across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
It was the summer of 1966, about 7 pm on an august evening, when three of us were riding motorcycles on mississippi highway 432 three miles west of pickens, mississippi. we spotted an orange light in the sky and pulled over on the shoulder of the road to watch it. it came pretty close to us. probably within 300 yards. it was silent and could stop motionless in the air.
it was glowing with an orange color, and shaped like a greyhound buss, and several times a search light came on pointed toward the ground. it stayed in the area for several hours, flying off to the norht once but returned. it also at one time flew straight up, almost out of sight, but returned. most of this time it was hovering two or three hundred feet above the ground about a quater mile south of us over a wooded area intermittently turning on and off a spot lignt. i was a teenager with strict parents and a specific time to be back home, so i left the other two still watching it.
content.summary: Several teenagers spot orange glowing rectangular objet with what appeared to be a searchlight.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in the garden,my son just called me on my cellphone, had a short conversation and hung up. turned to go into the house and looked up at the stars as i always do outside and a flash caught my eye, my first reaction was to call my wife, but i was awestruck watching it, the first thing i did was line the light up with my finger and a star so i could see if the travel was straight or erratic. it seemed to wobble in a straight line. i waited for any engine noise and there was none. it was now traveleing in an easterly direction and seemed to slow down over c.F.B. comox..And then it just disapeared! my son told me he saw the same light. he was 6 blocks south of me when he saw the same thing.  i knew at the time i was watching a u.F.O. its not the first i have seen and i know it wont be my last!   thanks for your website  b.W.Broere
content.summary: A bright star like object came from the north-west and traveled overhead ab out a mile up and proceeded in an easterly directi on...Appeared to slow down over c.F.B. comox and disapeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning home from the yucca valley area of san bernardino county, california.  i was a deputy sheriff assigned to the yucca valley station and had finished work about 2am.  i lived in the san bernardino area and it took me about an hour or so to drive the distance home.  i was south bound on hwy 247 that extends from the 10 freeway to yucca valley/morongo valley area just prior to the palm springs offramp.
the night was dark with no moon, i remember saying to myself how dark the desert road was and just stared out into my headlights as i drove along.
i was about half way between the small hills below morongo valley and the 10 freeway on hwy 247, when all of a sudden everything turned into daylight, i was able to see the surrounding desert terrain for about 100 yards in all directions, its was like the sun came up suddenly.  as quick as the lights came on they went out again and everything seemed darker than before.

i was traveling about 60 mph, but had slowed down when the place lite up.  i glanced to my right and observed a huge object i will call a craft for no better words to describe it.  the craft was traveling parallel to my vehicle, i slowed down almost to a stop, the craft almost appeared sort of cigar shaped with bluish-green lighting along the side i was observing.  i completely stopped my vehicle and stepped out into the darkness and noted the craft was huge, about 100 plus meters long and was hovering above the ground.  i didn't note any landing type gear or hear engine noise.  the object was about 50 meters away from my location at that time.
as i was watching the craft i noticed it was actually moving directly away from me across the desert toward some small hills.  when the craft got approx. a quarter to half mile away it turned in an upward motion and i discovered it wasen't long like a cigar, but oval like a disc, i could see the bluish-green lights around the exterior of the craft.
the craft seemed to move effortlessly, i never noticed any exhust system.
as i stood and watched the craft from the bottom view, all of a sudden it turned toward the southwestern sky and left so quickly the only way i can describe its departure is that if i blinked my eyes it flew off that fast leaving a light type trail for only a second something like when you wave a flashlight through the night and you see that quick flash of trailing light.
i remember just standing in the dark along that highway sort of dumbfounded.  i was never scared or threatened by the craft, but i would sure like to take another close up look at it.
i served in special forces, i was in intelligence, i had a top secret crypto security clearance, i observed up close the american spy plane flying out of south vietnam in 1968, iam a retired police officer, but never in my life did i ever experience something like what i observed in november 1979 along a darkened desert road, i only wish someone could have been with me.  i never really told people about what happened because i felt they would laugh at me or something.  i did check with local law enforcement and watched the local papers to see if anything had been reported the following few days, but to my knowledge nothing was reported.  thank you
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Driving car observed huge craft type object moving parallel to my vehicle approx. 50 yards away with lights so strong they lite up the dard desert terrain as though it was a sunny day.

content.detailedDescription: I was home from college for x-mas break. my mom, her friend, & my sister were sitting in the den area, which looks out onto a small cove  of lake norman. it was almost dark and we noticed a bright light shining into the den as we were talking, like a strong beam of light. we looked out the half closed blinds & saw a large, oval spaceship type of object that had a series of lights on the exterior, some of them were colored i think. we all went outside in the yard. it was hovering over the mariner villas condominiums right across the cove. it was crystal clear from the moment we saw it that it was not of this earth. this "spaceship" was close enough, & low enough that we could see a lot of detail. it was enormous. it appeared to be glowing from the inside, & had a misty appearance; it didn't look really heavy but was solid. i was extremely excited as i have had a huge fear of ufo's since childhood. i basically ran around like a chicken w/ its head cut off. i did not know what to do. i called the local news network to see if there had been any reportings of a ufo on lake norman. they said no, which was surprising b/c they were so close to residences. i told them i was looking at something unexplainable, but they didn't really seem interested. it moved very slowly & from a distance there appeared in succession two or three more of these spaceships. my mom's friend was in awe & seemed to want to communicate with them. my sister was frightened & my mom was pretty calm. after about 15 minutes of watching my dad came home from work & we showed him. he was pretty impressed. by this time they were on their way, but had been moving at a snail's pace. they finally faded into the distance easily since it was getting dark. unfortunately we had no cameras w/ film to capture it, which i sorely regret to this day. i forgot about it for a few years (perhaps repressed) but it resurfaced in a conversation with my sister recently & i was able to recall what i saw. i have been haunted by it ever since & have no doubt in my mind that we are being visited.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo sighting over lake norman, 5 witnesses

content.detailedDescription: It was mid-day and i was standing in my backyard when i noticed a dark slash in the sky. the sky was cloudless but the haze left it looking more white than blue. recently i emailed a photo of it to  pilot friend of mnie who is a ufo buff and he said i should send a copy to mufon. he thought, as did i, that the form was too smooth and perfect to be a natural occurance. i watched it for a short while and it never moved or changed. when i came back later it was gone from sight. i used a 5mp kodak camera for the photo. the picture i'm sending has been blown up and had the contrast adjusted so you can see the object. if you'd like i can send the raw photo (if you need it) for analysis. the trees in the photo are about 140 feet from my position and i'd estimate they are 30-40 feet tall. the object was south-south west of me and would appear to be over the gulf of mexico. i live just west of pensacola nas.
content.summary: Smooth cylindrical slash too perfect to be natural

content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Tiny disc object high in the sky with flashing lights moving all over the sky

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting outside at our patio table talking, around 10pm.  i looked up at the sky and mentioned that the stars were out; it had been cloudy earlier so i noticed that it had cleared up. a few minutes later, my husband was looking up and said "oh my god, look at that!" and for a moment i wasn't sure if he was looking at the sky or at a lilac bush that was behind his head.  he watched for a few seconds, we both got up, and he said he'd seen two lights moving very fast, they had almost intersected but they both turned abruptly and sort of looked like they were chasing each other.  i saw one of the lights, moving very fast toward the southwest, then it disappeared.  that was the last we saw of them even though we watched for another 10 minutes or so. they were very high; probably as high as a satellite (one of which we saw about 15 minutes later, moving slowly across the sky).  we live in the city of boise, not far from downtown.  we both agreed that you never see anything flying that high moving as fast as these lights moved, nor anything swerve as he saw them doing.
content.summary: Two lights moving very quickly at high altitude, swerving at right angles

content.detailedDescription: at about midnight, i was sitting on my back porch smoking a cigarrete. for some reason i turned my head to look through the trees and over my two neighbors houses. i saw what appeared to be a bright, red circle of light in the sky. i was somewhat intrigued and decided to watch it for a minute-- i was sure it would turn out to be a plane. it appeared to not be moving at all. i suddenly remembered i had my digital camera right inside. i grabbed it and ran back outside, sure the object would be gone. it was still there. i got the camerea ready and once again tried to discern if the light was moving at all. i picked a tree on each side of the object as focal points, held my body and eyes very still, and watched. now as i watched more carefully i could see it slowly moving up and down and side to side. at that moment i became somewhat nervous and a lot more interested. i was sure i was seeing something very strange and i was certain it was like no plane i have ever seen. it was very difficult to see the object through the camera because it kept moving out of the view of it. finally i captured about three pictures and went back inside to look at them. at first i was disappointed because the pictures looked exactly as i had seen with my naked eye. i then remembered that i could zoom in on objects with the camera. as i did this, the picures became a lot more ineresting. i could make out three distinct circles of what now looked like orange light. they were arranged in a triangle shape. in one of the pictures there is a streak of light that shows the object moving. i was convinced this was a ufo. it was getting to be late and i was now afraid. i went back out on the porch to look again, and it was gone. i called a friend who lives across town and asked him to look in the sky. he saw nothing. i am sure that someone else must have seen this ufo as it was so bright. it was a clear night and i saw no other aircraft in the sky. i approximate that it must have been over the ocean. at almost 1 am i gave up hope of seeing the object again and went to bed a little bit afraid of "men in black" or something of that nature coming in my house to steal my pictures.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw what looked like a bright red "circle". it moved in strange patterns. took a few pictures

content.detailedDescription: Clark and marge chadburn who are musicians were going to a performance when clark saw the object at 10,000 to 20,000 ft.  he asked marge to go back into the house for the binoculars.  the object swung from left to right smoothly as it ascended to the east. marge also saw the object. clark estimates that the object was bigger than a lear jet.
content.summary: Microphone shaped object panned left to right

content.detailedDescription: What he has drawn again into me is this one.....Again, if we can calculate inward then we can calculate outward....Example foriegn sphere object enters earth atmosphere......Sphere has dynamics produced from its centrifical force.....Conical volume (trail)   conical volume from trajectory vector entering earths gravity .....Two forces meet at center of sphere.....Object entering atmosphere creates ripple dynamics at atmospheric layers moving toward the earth......Physical forces and dynamics can be calculated and calibrated moment by moment.....Does this make sense.......??????
content.summary: Communications again with the entity

content.detailedDescription: After dinner i went outside and sat in a lawn chair beside the house.  i looked up at the sky and noticed what i thought was a plane, flying lower than normal.  as it passed over me going south i noticed that it didn't have any wings.  it was like a missile really long about 200 ft long judging from its height in the sky.  dark in color with reddish bands around it pointed tip and kind of shimmering in the sky.  i could see other planes higher in the sky leaving trails and could see even at that height, plane wings...But could see no wings on the missile-like object.  i passed due south over our house and by the time i went to the front of the house i couldn't see it anymore.
content.summary: it was dark in color and shimmery with red bands it was missile- like, with no wings or projections.

content.detailedDescription:
Here we go again.....More ideas comming through from our alien being(s).  there brains are so much more powerful that i feel overwhelmed by the influx of information!  it is giving me a headache....Now, i flunked calculus, i stink with computers and was never good at math, and never took physics, so you tell me if there is some sort of communication here???

okay  what they want to inform or maybe know if we know, are these facts:  

sometimes we need to calculate from all that is known and start large in equation to work our way backwards and calculate all the in betweens.  like a distributive equation ...Take all the knowns and solve for x y z.....So here goes....They say we formulate like this:  "i can calculate the velocity of a man jumping in the air and landing"    in an instant they have already calculated   mass...Volume...Density..And probability of that entity as it relates to  1.) position on earths surface 2.) distance from the earths center  3.) distance from the earth to the moon 4.) distance from the sun..   5.) velocity of the earth  as  it relates to gravity and velocity of earths rotation around the sun (and gravitational pull of the moon>???)   simply put....How much can we calculate or estimate if we are able to "calibrate"   a mass or volume as it relates to its tiny position on the earths surface....As earth is a sphere, each gps point being as a pin on a pin cushion....Couldnt we use this even tracking it in mid air and the physics involved in all the formularies to include gravitational effect of planetary velocity and or rotation and force?   do we not have to look at all the angles to calculate what is not only in between but also what my be "produced"????????
content.summary: Addendum to abduction and direct comunication.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a bright white ball of light throbbing or pulsating. and then it zoomed off real fast. woosh!!!!!!!! i have been bothered by it all day and have searched the ne,t watched the news, and checked the newspaper to see if anyone else saw it. what is going on? i am still excited and want to know has there been anyone else out there that has seen it.
content.summary: A ball of bright white light

content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like object

content.detailedDescription:
I had seen several possible ufo's starting at 9:30pm.  first was a triangle ufo comming from the south/west heading northeast.  flying at a slow pace, and at a high altitude, around 20k agl.  this object had a light in each corner, white, amber, with lights that flash and dance around them(red). flew out of sight.

next, around 10pm i saw 2 lights(spheres) come from the outer atmosphere(northeastern sky) looking like a star, then it slowed down, and turned west/southwest at a constant speed over the tree lines.  seconds later, the second one did the same exact thing.  lights where amber.

lastly,  i saw a ufo just miss colliding with a jet airliner.  both were flying in a northernly direction , while both were flying closer and closer to each other. when i believe the jet finally saw the ufo, they were 10 to 15 seconds from hitting, when the jet banked to the northeast.

this ufo was a square shape, with 4 lights in each corner. red, amber, green, and rose.  2 of the lights flashed like strobes.  in the center of the bottom of the square was a light in the shape of a square that changed colors.

the ufo continued it's northern direction until out of sight.
content.summary: Ufo/ jet airliner near miss collision
Man and his daughter observe multicolored lights in the air near horsetooth reservoir.
